alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Howard; Martin; Midland; Reagan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Glasscock, southeastern Ector, Midland, northwestern Reagan, southwestern Borden, Howard, southeastern Martin, eastern Crane and northern Upton Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 942 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Luther to 9 miles northeast of Crane. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midland, Big Spring, Greenwood, Garden City, Stanton, Coahoma, Forsan, Sand Springs, Lomax, Luther, Cotton Flat, Midkiff, Skywest Airport, Big Spring Country Club, Courtney, Big Spring McMahon-Wrinkle Airpark, Knott, Vealmoor, Stanton Municipal Aiport and Elbow. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 138 and 195. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
